name: CardCon
description:
CardCon is a RogueLike Deck-building game heavily inspired by my visit to Exilecon.

 CardCon is intended to be 30-45 minutes long. You, as a CardCon attendee will build a deck, fight monsters and attempt to defeat the four guardians before finally facing The Eldritch Horror, all within the 2 day time limit.

The game is currently early access. Over time I will be adding more to CardCon including a trading NPC, character classes, more cards and achievements.
